name: agentic-testing-dashboard
description: Web dashboard for Agentic AI Testing System

scripts.dev: export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=${XDG_RUNTIME_DIR:-/tmp/runtime-$USER} && export QT_QPA_PLATFORM=offscreen && export QT_LOGGING_RULES='*=false' && mkdir -p "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR" && vite
scripts.dev:headless: export DISPLAY= && export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/tmp/runtime-$USER && export QT_QPA_PLATFORM=offscreen && export QT_LOGGING_RULES='*=false' && mkdir -p "$XDG_RUNTIME_DIR" && vite
